00020 #ifndef _RTAI_NUCLEUS_SYSCALL_H
00021 #define _RTAI_NUCLEUS_SYSCALL_H
00022 
00023 #include <nucleus/asm/syscall.h>
00024 
00025 /* RTAI/fusion multiplexer syscall. */
00026 #define __xn_sys_mux    555
00027 /* RTAI/fusion nucleus syscalls. */
00028 #define __xn_sys_bind       0   /* muxid = bind_to_interface(magic,infp) */
00029 #define __xn_sys_completion 1   /* xnshadow_completion(&completion) */
00030 #define __xn_sys_migrate    2   /* switched = xnshadow_relax/harden() */
00031 #define __xn_sys_barrier    3   /* started = xnshadow_wait_barrier(&entry,&cookie) */
00032 
00033 typedef struct xnsysinfo {
00034 
00035     unsigned long long cpufreq; /* CPU frequency */
00036     unsigned long tickval;      /* Tick duration (ns) */
00037 
00038 } xnsysinfo_t;
00039 
00040 typedef struct xninquiry {
00041 
00042     char name[32];
00043     int prio;
00044     unsigned long status;
00045     void *khandle;
00046     void *uhandle;
00047 
00048 } xninquiry_t;
00049 
00050 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00051 
00052 #include <linux/types.h>
00053 
00054 struct task_struct;
00055 
00056 #define XNARCH_MAX_SYSENT 255
00057 
00058 typedef struct _xnsysent {
00059 
00060     int (*svc)(struct task_struct *task,
00061                struct pt_regs *regs);
00062 
00063 /* Syscall must run into the Linux domain. */
00064 #define __xn_exec_lostage    0x1
00065 /* Syscall must run into the RTAI domain. */
00066 #define __xn_exec_histage    0x2
00067 /* Shadow syscall; caller must be mapped. */
00068 #define __xn_exec_shadow     0x4
00069 /* Switch back toggle; caller must return to its original mode. */
00070 #define __xn_exec_switchback 0x8
00071 /* Exec in current domain. */
00072 #define __xn_exec_current    0x10
00073 /* Context-agnostic syscall. */
00074 #define __xn_exec_any        0x0
00075 /* Short-hand for shadow init syscall. */
00076 #define __xn_exec_init       __xn_exec_lostage
00077 /* Short-hand for shadow syscall in RTAI space. */
00078 #define __xn_exec_primary   (__xn_exec_shadow|__xn_exec_histage)
00079 /* Short-hand for shadow syscall in Linux space. */
00080 #define __xn_exec_secondary (__xn_exec_shadow|__xn_exec_lostage)
00081 
00082     u_long flags;
00083 
00084 } xnsysent_t;
00085 
00086 extern int nkgkptd;
00087 
00088 #define xnshadow_ptd(t)    ((t)->ptd[nkgkptd])
00089 #define xnshadow_thread(t) ((xnthread_t *)xnshadow_ptd(t))
00090 
00091 #else /* !__KERNEL__ */
00092 
00093 #include <sys/types.h>
00094 
00095 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */
00096 
00097 typedef struct xncompletion {
00098 
00099     long syncflag;              /* Semaphore variable. */
00100     pid_t pid;                  /* Single waiter ID. */
00101 
00102 } xncompletion_t;
00103 
00104 #endif /* !_RTAI_NUCLEUS_SYSCALL_H */
